answers.question: Have you participated in a previous Gitcoin Grants Round? If so, please name the rounds or link the builder profile to prior rounds.

answers.answer:
​Superchain.Eco enhances Ethereum's infrastructure by accelerating the adoption of Ethereum’s Superchain through initiatives like the Superchain Index, our platform Superchain.eco, and Super Accounts.​ Since our launch in late 2023, our total reach has grown to over 3 million impressions and our website attracted over 119,000 unique visitors (source here https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/11OliTrC0AoUknC85SVOLOV6xggWx9jcMMcvXQpZJ49A/edit#gid=608522890). 

Superchain Index
The Superchain Index offers a transparent overview of all members within the Superchain. It tracks chain details, modifications, and configurations, serving as a valuable resource for developers and users. In March 2025 nearly 4,000 unique individuals used the Superchain Index (source here https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/11OliTrC0AoUknC85SVOLOV6xggWx9jcMMcvXQpZJ49A/edit#gid=608522890).
Super Accounts
Super Accounts are smart accounts that streamline and reward meaningful onchain user interactions. The accounts help drive user activity in line with Superchain and Ecosystem growth objectives. So far, over 60,000 Super Accounts have been created. The full set of metrics, including account growth and activity trends can be seen on the Dune Dashboard here (https://dune.com/superchain_eco/super-accounts)
answers.question: How does your project contribute significantly to the Ethereum network's infrastructure? Please provide specific examples and metrics if available.

answers.answer:
- Our Superchain Index makes it easy to understand and compare various Ethereum L2s that use the OP Stack. It promotes chains that are more Ethereum-aligned, further along, the decentralization stages, and aim to be interoperable.  
- The Programs and Project features of Superchain.Eco has made it extremely user-friendly to explore ongoing programs and learn about dApps built on Ethereum L2s.
- Our team has also played an important role in helping realize the Ethereum Interop event series in Bangkok and Denver.
- Super Account has made being onchain extra engaging and rewarding. So far over 60,000 accounts have been created with over half reaching level 2 or higher (showcasing onchain activity).
answers.question: Describe any pioneering development work in your project, particularly in enhancing privacy, interoperability, or user experience.

answers.answer:
As Ethereum scales through its L2 roll-up strategy, it's become more powerful, but also more fragmented and harder to navigate. Users struggle to understand how individual L2s fit into Ethereum's broader vision for a user-owned internet. At the same time, L2 ecosystems need better ways to measure, reward, and grow meaningful participation that aligns with Ethereum's long-term goals.

Our solutions are unique as they provide an end-to-end experience between discovery and usage.

1\. A platform for ecosystem discovery and understanding: We surface curated, ecosystem-specific data and insights to help users and contributors explore the Superchain, OP Stack, and Ethereum's scaling roadmap, and onchain applications.

2\. Super Accounts for activation: Super Accounts recognize and reward value-aligned onchain activities that contribute to the overall vision of the user-owned internet. Unlike other onchain rewards solutions, all activities are curated by our team which ensures that the Super Account level is an actual representation of someone's contribution to Superchain L2s, allowing for better match-making between users, dApps, and protocols.

Together, this improves on existing alternatives by making Ethereum more understandable, participation more rewarding, and public goods development more targeted and transparent.
answers.question: What specific problems or challenges in the Ethereum ecosystem does your project address? How does your solution improve upon existing alternatives?

answers.answer:
Our primary aim is to continue to enhance the stability and functionality of our main solutions and continue to support Ethereum interoperability and dApps. This Gitcoin grant will help us progress on the following fronts:

1.  Expand our Superchain.eco platform functionality - adding in new features such as "yield opportunities" and further building out our Programs functionality to make it even easier for users to explore and benefit from active campaigns. 

2.  Improve Super Accounts interface and functions - creating a cross-Superchain account that allows users to benefit from the upcoming Superchain and Ethereum Interopabiliy benefits to create the most rewarding onchain experience possible. New features include a token reward feature, better multi-chain functionality, and a reworked UI.
answers.question: Outline your project's roadmap and how the grant funds will be used to achieve your development goals.

answers.answer: By making access to information on Ethereum’s L2 more accessible, increasing the discoverability of dApps built on Ethereum L2s, and creating rewarding contributor/user paths - Superchain Eco helps accelerate the adoption and development of the Ethereum network.
answers.question: How does your project contribute to the decentralization and security of the Ethereum network?

For any project deploying smart contracts on blockchain networks, please list all your deployer addresses and their corresponding blockchain networks. Use this format for each entry: [deployer_address], [chain_id]—for example, 0x123abc..., 42161 (This represents a deployer address on the Arbitrum network). Please include a separate line for each unique deployer address and blockchain combination.

project.title: Superchain Eco
project.description: We're an open platform dedicated to accelerating the adoption and development of the Superchain and the broader Ethereum ecosystem. Our mission is to help realize the user-owned internet built on Ethereum and drive its growth through meaningful participation, insightful analytics, and innovative solutions such as the Superchain Index and Super Accounts.
